## CommandKitHMREvent

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/dev-hooks.ts" sourceLine="26" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents an HMR event in CommandKit.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandKitHMREvent {
    event: HMREventType;
    path: string;
    accept: () => void;
    preventDefault: () => void;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### event

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/hmrevent-type#hmreventtype'>HMREventType</a>`}   />

The type of HMR event.
### path

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The path associated with the HMR event.
### accept

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`() =&#62; void`}   />

Accepts the HMR event, indicating that it has been handled.
This prevents further processing of the event.
### preventDefault

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`() =&#62; void`}   />

Prevents the default action for the HMR event.
This can be used to stop further processing of the event.


</div>
